items.title: 436: Control UI with Greg Whitworth
items.content: This episode is about evolving the web platform. Meaning literally the change process of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This is a complicated and sometimes slow process. It involves developers like us (squeaky wheels), standards bodies (the web is bad without governance), browser vendors (whole complicated stew of people), and people like our guest. Outside influencers and shepherds to this process.
